fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.extra.bag

Class SimpleSubListKernel<S,T extends java.util.List<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<T>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.extra.bag.SimpleSubListKernel<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S -
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleSubListKernel<S,T extends java.util.List<S>>
extends Kernel<T>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Kernel on bags of same length.
    Let B1 and B2 be bags of elements b1[i] and b2[i], let k(b1[i],b2[i]) be the minor kernel, then K(B1, B2) = sum_{i=n}^{N} k(b1[i],b2[i])
    With n and N being the bounds of the sum.
    Author:
    dpicard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
